"Never underestimate the fact that the market is an excellent discounter of the future."

author: Mr.Market
text:

Good day speculators

author: Mr.Market
text:
"Investment is about making mistakes, win by not loosing too often."

Good day speculators

author: Mr.Market
text:
"After a long upward move is when you should be most on your guard."

Good day humans

author: Mr.Market
text:
"One of the greatest disciplines in technical analysis is that it forces you to cut losses and run profits-something that is easier said than done."

Good week humans

author: Mr.Market
text:

author: Mr.Market
text:

Good day humans

author: Mr.Market
text:
"The job of a professional investor is as much about avoiding disasters as it is about picking winners."

Good day speculators

author: Mr.Market
text:
In regard to the stock market, picking shares is like a beauty contest where it is more important to choose not who you think is the prettiest girl, but who the judges think is the prettiest.

Good day speculators

author: Mr.Market
text:
"Central principle of investment is to go contrary to the general opinion, on the ground that if everyone agreed about its merit, the investment is inevitably too dear and therefore unattractive."

Good day ladies and gentlemen

author: Mr.Market
text:
"Successful investment is a blend of standing your own ground and listening to the market."

Good day humans

text:

text: "Keep your head high when others are loosing theirs."

text:
"The willingness to be fearful when others are greedy and greedy when they're fearful."
